ltl2rabin

Class GDRA

  • Object
    • ltl2rabin.Automaton<T,U>
      • ltl2rabin.RabinAutomaton<Pair<PropEquivalenceClass,List<Slave.State>>,Set<String>>
        • ltl2rabin.GDRA

  • public class GDRA
extends RabinAutomaton<Pair<PropEquivalenceClass,List<Slave.State>>,Set<String>>
    A GDRA object represents a generalized deterministic Rabin automaton.

      • GDRA

        public GDRA(ImmutableSet<? extends RabinAutomaton.State<Pair<PropEquivalenceClass,List<Slave.State>>,Set<String>>> states,

            Set<Set<Pair<Set<GDRA.Transition>,Set<GDRA.Transition>>>> rabinCondition,
            ImmutableSet<Set<String>> alphabet)
        Parameters:
        states - The immutable set of all States of this automaton.
        initialState - The initial State
        rabinCondition - The set that represents the generalized rabin condition
        alphabet - The alphabet the automaton runs on
